question_text: Which of the following best describes application containerization?
answer_options: It allows different operating systems to share a virtual machine
It installs applications across multiple physical servers
It runs applications in isolated environments without full OS overhead
It requires a Type 1 hypervisor to function
correct_answer: It runs applications in isolated environments without full OS overhead
explanation: Application containerization runs apps in isolated environments using a shared OS, avoiding the need for full VMs.
